title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 913.2 - Railroad bridge inventory, inspections, and load rating
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 913.2 - Railroad bridge inventory, inspections, and load rating

State Regulations

The Commissioner of Transportation hereby adopts
49 CFR
Par t 237 and Appendix A thereto with regard to bridge safety standard s with
the same force and effect as though fully set forth at length here in, with the
exception of
49 CFR
237.7
and Appendix B
thereto. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
913.2

Adopted

New

York State Register September 27, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 39, eff. 9/27/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
